Document names in the Document List window can be shown in various ways:Document List windowhide/shrink/show path nameshidingpath namesshrinkingpath namesshowingpath namespath nameshide/shrink/show
Without the path name, for example, as Mydoc.htm.
With the path name, for example, as ps303\final\source\mydoc.htm.
With the path name shrunk to eight characters, for example, as ps303\f;...\mydoc.htm.

Which way is appropriate depends on your preferences and the amount of view details you already specified for the Document List window. To hide or shrink the path names, select Hide Path or Shrink Path from the View menu. To show the path names, select Show Path from the View menu.
If the Name column in the Document List window is too narrow or too wide, you can drag the column border accordingly. draggingcolumn borderscolumn bordersdragging
